name: D&D Session Notes
description:
These minimal D&D session notes make it simple and easy to use with your dungeons and dragons game. Great for short sessions or an extended campaign, these notes focus just on the essentials and get your recording your notes in no time.

Included is a ZIP file with
---------------------------------
- Fillable PDFs, JPGs and PNGs of each sheet
- Pages for a session and an extended campaign: checklist, loot list, session notes, location notes
- Mix and Match pages to meet your needs!
- Free fonts for compatibility

Fillable PDF Help
---------------------------------
Adobe Acrobat is free to use and download to be able to fill out and view PDFs. Before editing the PDFs, be sure to install the included fonts so that the design will work as expected.

For Best Quality
---------------------------------
- Print at 100%
- Print on card stock or laminate to reuse so you can write with a dry erase pen
- It is recommended to print on a heavy cardstock for extra durability
